subject: Haptic reactor pro disconnects
description_text:
Hi,

My Simsonn haptic reactor pro disconnects after 10-15 min of use.

Any ideas to solve this problem?

Met vriendelijke groet, kind regards,

Michael van Eerdt

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael van Eerdt,    This issue is most likely caused by insufficient power supply. Please connect the USB cable directly to the blue USB 3.0 port on the back of your PC and avoid using a USB hub, as it may cause unstable power or connection issues.  If you are using a PlusX control box, please check for the green grounding wire and securely connect it to a screw on the pedal body or frame to ensure proper grounding.

Hi,

Thanks for your quick reply.

Indeed direct connect to a pc 3.0 slot solves my problem.

I’m very impressed and happy with my pedals, great job!

Have a nice day.

Met vriendelijke groet, kind regards,

Michael van Eerdt
Fast reply with right solution. I’m very happy.
